title: WiBit.Net Video Tutorial - HTML Beginner CrashCourse
description:
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ************************ WiBit.Net Video Tutorial ************************ */
/* ************************************************************************** */
Title          : HTML Beginner CrashCourse
Num Videos     : 15
Lesson Length  : 3 hours 44 minutes 38 seconds
Resolution     : 640 x 480
Codec Download : http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp
Date Recorded  : 5/20/2005
Narrator(s)    : Kevin Willett
OS:            : Microsoft Windows 2000
Software       : 
Description    : These completely improvised video tutorials will take you 
                 from a complete novice to writing your very own HTML documents 
                 in no time! These videos are very comprehensive and unedited. 
                 This means that there is some BAD LANGUAGE and also some 
                 programming screw-ups throughout. But that&#039;s ok because 
                 debugging syntax errors will make you a better programmer. 
                 The user in mind is someone who has a basic understanding 
                 of using the Windows Operating System. Get watching, and get 
                 coding right away! The original AVI?s for this 
                 series were lost and only the Shockwave files posted online 
                 still survive! Enjoy!
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= Video List -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Video 1        : Getting Started
Video 2        : Text Formatting 1
Video 3        : Assignment 1
Video 4        : Text Formatting 2
Video 5        : Text Formatting 3
Video 6        : Text Formatting 4
Video 7        : Hyperlinks
Video 8        : Images & Hyperlinks
Video 9        : Assignment 2
Video 10       : Page Properties 1
Video 11       : Page Properties 2
Video 12       : Page Properties 3
Video 13       : Frames: Part 1
Video 14       : Frames: Part 2
Video 15       : Final Assignment
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ***************************** About WiBit.Net **************************** */
/* ************************************************************************** */
WiBit was a website used by college students (and one professor) from Towson 
University in Baltimore, Maryland as a repository for learning materials. The
site creators were former Computer Science and Computer Security students, 
Kevin Willett and Bryan Stouffer. The first WiBit Tutorials were created by 
Kevin as a study aid for himself in late 2003. Over the following years Kevin
and Bryan decided to create a few tutorials and give themselves and their
fellow students a place to view and use them. Some were used as presentation
aids and students teaching students seminars. Over 30 tutorials were created!
The WiBit Tutorials served themselves well! All the students involved in the
project became professionals in their field of study. The creators Kevin and 
Bryan currently develop medical software. Others are working for great 
companies such as Bowing and Lockheed Martin. Since college the need to 
create tutorials has died down, but who knows what the future holds!
